page.title: 10Warmingham Women's Institute
page.content: This thriving,50 strong,non-political and non-sectarian society has as its motto"For Home and Country".Its mem- bers ages range from 14 to 80.Its mai -n aim is to educate and provide soci- al and recreational activities.To this end monthly meetings are held during which talks,lectures and demonstratio- ns are given on subjects as varied as cookery,health education,travel and social concerns.Amongst the latter are drug abuse,child abuse,death grants, the decline of rural bus routes,trad- ing standards etc.Competitions,shows, classes and courses often result from these meetings.Last year,for example, we entered the Cheshire County Show and won the Silver Cup for Crafts whic -h led to our being invited to repres -ent Cheshire at the Royal Show.The membership enjoy taking part in as many activities as possible.
